name: Butternut Squash With Anise
keywords: anise, butternut squash, side dish, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds butternut squash, peeled and cut in large dice or into 1/4-inch-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Cook squash in water to cover until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain.
Combine squash with butter and anise and process with steel blade of food processor or in blender to make a puree. Reheat if necessary.
